Description:
Under Contract
Get ready to be wowed, this property is an opportunity not to be missed! Situated amongst beautifully landscaped gardens and mature trees on a massive allotment of 1,618sqm approx., it is a private hideaway with all the space you could want!
Comprising of 4 bedrooms, including master with built in robes and ensuite, further three bedrooms with built in robes, main family bathroom & separate toilet, laundry with yard access, kitchen and meals area and a large and separate lounge.
The kitchen has been updated in recent years, with glass splashback, stainless steel appliances and neutral cabinetry and bench tops which blends well with the homes subtle palette. Opening out onto the undercover pergola area, the kitchen and meals area has a wonderful view and will ensure hosting guests is a breeze with the functional layout. With gas wall furnace heating and split system cooling you will be comfortable all year around, no matter the season.
The outside of the home is very impressive and will be sure to please those with boats, caravans, trailers or machinery, as it offers a large double shed with work bench and ample off street parking within the property. With secure fencing separating the initial off street parking from the rear drive and shed, the property is well equipped to accommodate families and tradespeople. With an additional garden shed and veggie garden at the rear you will be delighted by the size of the grounds, with the lush green grass and sweeping birch trees, it is a garden lover's delight!
Located just a short walk from the Crib Point Shops, Schools, public transport and sporting and recreational facilities, this home is positioned perfectly within reach to all you could need!

Description:
'NGALLA' | Sophistication & Charm With Rear Access On 1,485sqm
Early 20th Century origins steep this gorgeous cottage in an aura of classic elegance and coastal ambiance.
Step through the endearing leadlight front door and across the polished timber floors, whilst admiring the sash windows, decorative ceilings and picture cornices to artfully display your favourite pieces.
~ Extend, renovate or subdivide (S.T.C.A.) on approximately 1,485sqm.
~ The master bedroom ensures premium comfort with mirrored built-in-robes and a ceiling fan, whilst the second bedroom is serviced by built-ins and the beautifully-appointed main bathroom with bath and overhead shower.
~ It provides the luxury of three living spaces – a formal lounge room with a stunning gas fireplace, split system heating & cooling and adjoining home office; a wonderfully spacious dining room with a traditional combustion stove, and a cosy sitting room that flows out to a huge entertainer's deck overlooking manicured gardens.
~ The flexible floor-plan offers the potential to convert the lounge room into a sizable third bedroom.
~ Equipped with stainless steel appliances, Mallacoota Bloodwood benchtops and more-than-ample cabinet space, the kitchen is conveniently placed to overlook the deck, so you can keep an eye on the kids playing or chat to your guests through the servery.
~ Rear laneway access to a 9m x 6m three-phase shed and double carport to store a caravan or trailer.
~ Other noteworthy features include a single carport, garden shed, 10,000lt water tank and flourishing citrus trees.
~ Boutique shops, transport and leading schools are counted as neighbours of this lifestyle address.

Description:
Tradies Delight On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
Peacefully set on a leafy street, this immaculate home is ready to live in now, yet offers a tantalising proposition for those looking to fulfill their renovation dream!
Situated within minutes of the town centre and a short stroll from public transport and Dartnell Reserve, the convenience factor is high.
~ All of the bedrooms are roomy and quiet, while the master includes a built-in-robe, split system heating & cooling unit, and easy access to the updated main bathroom.
~ The functional kitchen offers plenty of bench space, gas cooking and a Delonghi dishwasher.
~ For the colder months, there is a Rinnai gas heater and split system heating & cooling unit in the living room.
~ The outdoor alfresco has been enclosed for year-round enjoyment, with plenty of space for entertaining and relaxation.
~ Side access to a triple carport and two double garages with power and concrete flooring.
~ The spacious pet-friendly yard is complemented by lush lawns and a large garden shed for additional storage.

Description:
The Perfect Starter On 820sqm (Approx.)
Presenting a versatile floorplan that will suit families of all sizes, this entry-level residence offers endless potential on approximately 820sqm.
Families with children will be attracted to the closeness of St Joseph's Primary School, as well as Cyril Fox Reserve and the community swimming pool. This well-connected location is a short stroll from the town centre, while also being close to coastal walking trails and Woolleys Beach.
~ Master bedroom offering a walk-in-robe and ensuite.
~ Two remaining bedrooms with built-in-robes + fourth bedroom or study.
~ Open plan dining and kitchen, consisting of a Dishlex dishwasher, gas cooktop and double fridge cavity, overlooking the generous sunroom at the rear.
~ Facing north, the lounge room welcomes in lots of lovely natural light, boasting a Vulcan heater and split system heating & cooling for year round comfort.
~ Side access to a single carport.
~ Further outdoor features include a large shed, storage room, two smaller sheds and a caravan with an annex, which could be utilised as a teenagers retreat.

Description:
Fantastic Family Home On A Quarter Acre!
Positioned centrally on a generous allotment of approximately 996m2, this well-presented, original family home offers an exciting array of future options for those seeking to renovate or extend or simply enjoy the good life in a quiet leafy location.
This substantial family home comprises of three sizeable bedrooms all with built in robes, main family bathroom, a central and updated kitchen which offers gas & electric appliances and adjoins to the L-shaped lounge room and overlooks the separate dining zone. Complete with ducted heating and air conditioning unit, this home presents as the perfect package.
Aspiring entertainers will be delighted by the large backyard with established gardens, playground, chicken coop and the ultimate 'Man Cave' adjoining the large free standing shed to the rear. The separate shedding zone offers a wood fire coonara and powder room, the ideal cosy hideaway for entertaining or relaxing.
With dual fencing to ensure the safety of pets (should you have them) the property is well equipped to take on a new family and any of your four legged or feathered friends. Situated within easy reach of Morradoo Train Station, public transport, parks and the local shops, this home's location couldn't get any better. Contact Jason Dowler anytime for further information.

Address: 297 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Stylish, Chic' & Low Maintenance
Have you been searching for a home with character, charm or that something special that you haven't managed to find thus far? Then look no further! With an appealing façade, this gorgeous home is set back behind secure and private fencing and is filled with, sophistication, style & all the modern conveniences you could need.
Situated just a short walk from public transport, the local primary school, pool & shops, and the near-by bushland reserve, this property is positioned within arm's reach to all of the local amenities and sure to tick the location box on your search criteria!
As you enter the home, you are greeted with a bright and inviting L shaped lounge, dining and separate kitchen, which features neutral tones, stainless steel appliances including large 900mm freestanding oven /stove and a well-positioned window that overlooks the gorgeous courtyard, which will be sure to host many a summer event or family gathering.
Boasting 3 generous sized bedrooms with built in robes, a large family bathroom and second toilet/powder room for guests, it has all the modern touches to make life a breeze. The home also has the most inviting gas fire place, which will be sure to keep you cosy on those chilly winter days & nights, along with ceiling fans to complete the climate control aspect of your search!
Garden lovers will be pleased to see the established trees and landscaping, including stunning birds of paradise and privacy screening plants, to ensure your oasis is private and secure. To complete the list of features, the property has a double carport, ample off street parking & additional shedding, we're sure that you will be impressed with all that is on offer.
Contact Jason Dowler anytime for further details!

Description:
Space, Tranquillity & Room For All The Toys!
Perfectly positioned on a generous allotment of 938sqm (Approx.), this family friendly, three bedroom home is ideally tucked away in a quiet street, overlooking the foreshore reserve & offers immediate lifestyle enjoyment with a large rear yard & low maintenance gardens.
Enter the home and you will be greeted by a large, open plan living area equipped with gas wall furnace heating, celling fans and air conditioning to provide comfort all year round. Having been recently updated, the Kitchen looks sleek and modern, with gas and electric appliances including dishwasher, and overlooks the meals & living area. All three bedrooms are equipped with built in robes & ceiling fans which are serviced by a central family bathroom, separate toilet room and laundry.
With plenty of space, inside and out, the home is perfect for entertaining family and friends, with a large decked area and on offer, secure rear yard for pets, garden tool shed, a single & double carport, double lock up garage/shed to accommodate a boat, van or trailer plus a long drive offers ample off street parking.
This property would make the ideal place for the family to call home or perfect for investors looking for a quality addition to their property portfolio

Description:
Stylishly Updated Home In A Quiet Cul-De-Sac Setting
Stylishly updated and beautifully presented, this fabulous home ticks just about every box. On entry, an immediate coastal vibe is felt with fresh interiors displayed and a neutral colour palette on offer.
Within close proximity to Morradoo Station, Primary schools and boutique cafes. This property will suit a first home buyer, retired couple or an astute investor who is looking for a low maintenance property with no active body corporate.
~ Three bedrooms, master with built-in-robe and ceiling fan.
~ Generous light filled living space with defined dining area, and the added luxury of two-way blinds and floating floorboards underfoot.
~ The modern kitchen is both eye-catching and highly functional with stainless steel appliances and a stylish glass splashback.
~ Entertaining is made easy with a private alfresco, and two enclosed courtyards that are child and pet-friendly.
~ Split system heating and cooling in the main living zone.
~ Other noteworthy features include a single carport and garden shed for additional storage.

Description:
A Home To Love
Full of charming character, this recently renovated home is perfect for a family. Bright and spacious residence with relaxed entertaining spaces and tranquil privacy.
Situated in a popular location just moments from Morradoo Station, schools and local cafés. Set on 567sqm (approx.) corner block with rear access to double garage.
~ Three bedrooms with robes, large master bedroom offering walk-in-robe, ensuite and ceiling fan.
~ Spacious lounge with split-system heating and cooling.
~ Modern kitchen with gas cooktop, westinghouse dishwasher and westinghouse oven.
~ Large alfresco area perfect for entertaining all year round.
~ Ducted heating throughout.
~ Wide concrete drive way with space for a caravan and two cars.
~ Beautiful landscaped gardens.

Address: 1/288 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Classic Hamptons Style
Modern and comfortable. Tick. Quality finishes. Tick. Well maintained. Tick.
This home strikes the right balance between classic and coastal.
We loved the airiness of the open plan living with the ambience of the wood fire and the instant comfort of Air Conditioning.
Natural timber finish floating floors compliment snow white stone countertops in the sleek white kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
In the garden there's plenty of space for a pet, veggie gardens, play area and outdoor setting under the pergola.
There is a lock up garage with room for storage, separate laundry, water tank system with pump and NBN internet connection.
Look here if you want to live in a larger unit that's easy to maintain.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
Under Contract
Located in leafy Crib Point, surrounded by quality homes & recreational parks, this charming and solid 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is set on a generous 1,193m2 (approx.) and will suit first home buyers, tradies, retires & investors alike.
Featuring built in robes in all 3 bedrooms, central family bathroom and an open plan living & dining with functional kitchen that overlooks the gorgeous rear yard. With the home positioned to the front of the block, it leaves ample back yard to accommodate a multitude of family, trade or recreational pursuits. The property also offers an excellent undercover alfresco area, accessible from the kitchen and meals area, which will be sure to host many a summer event.
Further features include gas heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans, secure fencing, garden shedding & loads of room for off street parking & rear yard access.
All of this and just within a stone's throw to local shops (including pharmacy) & public transport, this home has much to offer its potential purchaser, inside and out.

Description:
Fancy A Little Bit of History
The original manor of Crib Point is for sale.
Set on a fully landscaped cottage lot with large carport.
It's big, approx 25sq offering 5 bedrooms, full ensuite, ducted heating av and huge family room.
Other features include claw foot bath, leadlight windows, high ceilings, polished floor boards and ceiling roses.
A massive ball room (living area) and modernised kitchen, including dishwater.
French doors open onto a large entertainment area, all this completes this package.
Be part of history, call now for inspection.

Description:
Ideal Family Home - 4 Bedrooms Plus Study!
Situated in a quiet no through road, this contemporary and spacious home is ideal for the growing or established family!
Features include:-
- 4 bedrooms with built in robes
- Well designed master suite with walk thru robe and ensuite
- Study
- Separate and spacious living and dining areas
- Ducted Heating/Reverse Cycle Cooling
- Premium kitchen with ample bench space, stainless steel appliances and Caesar Stone benchtops
- Huge outdoor under cover entertaining area
- All of this while still maintaining a spacious backyard with plenty of room for play.
Contact Sean Crimmins on 0411 734 814 for further information.
